attributes.title: horrible!
attributes.review: Okay, so, It took FOREVER to download this app. It’s very confusing, I tried to support trump, I couldn’t, it was very slow service. 1/10. I do NOT recommend this app.

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: Unable to get this app to download at first. Finally logged in and can’t easily navigate to content. Cancel- do not recommend

attributes.title: Annoyed
attributes.review: I could u not this app made my phone blow up so me and my family had to buy a whole new house and it tried to make me buy wigs and orange dye

attributes.title: Don’t get it
attributes.review: This app is the worst one I’ve seen yet it took way to long to download and when it did it was trash it’s honestly just not the vibe.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I hat this app so much because it keeps on glitching to an orange (and I’m allergic) it also sent snipers to my grandma and now we have to plan a funeral for her. Thank you trump for sending snipers to my grandma.

attributes.title: very disappointed :(
attributes.review: when i first heard of bunker boy’s app i was ecstatic! but when i downloaded it, i was severely disappointed. as soon as i opened it up, the app kept crashing! i literally couldnt open it without it logging me out >:( well, this app quality is very reflective of his presidential potential, so he has lost a vote from me. very unfortunate :/

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: The app took hours to download and install and once you try to open is it restarts your phone

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: It’s a horrible app! Do not get it. Very dysfunctional. It may have persuaded me not to vote for Trump in November. Actually, I definitely won’t be voting for him after getting this terrible app.

attributes.title: My phone exploded
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app for the first time, my phone actually exploded in my hands. I’m having to write this review from my husbands phone. Smh

attributes.title: do not download
attributes.review: very much ghetto . as soon as i opened the app , it told me to go back to the fields and my mexican friend told me that when she opened the app , it said go back to your country . but when my white friend opened the app , it said “ you are welcomed , i love you “ so i don’t know . maybe we should take this app of the app store instead of banning tik tok .
